name: Scourge Doctors
description:
The Scourge overtook the world. Those whom fell to the sickness rush to Scourge Town.

Scourge Town is a Tower Defense game created for the First Ever Jam-Re Vival . You take the role of an enclave of Plague Doctors entering a refuge for those who fell victim for the Plague rampaging through the world of man. But as news spreads across the land of such kind hearted endavour, soon the gates of Scourge Town are flooded by an indescribable amount of persons.
